commit.message:
builtins.c (expand_builtin_apply_args_1): Call force_operand on plus_constant result.

	* builtins.c (expand_builtin_apply_args_1) [STACK_GROWS_DOWNWARD]:
	Call force_operand on plus_constant result.

From-SVN: r75306
